Arrays

July 28, 2014

Coding Tips.

  1. Use Arrays.fill(arr, 0) or ‘Collections.fill(…)’ to fill. java boolean[] used = new boolean[9]; // default value should be false Arrays.fill(used, true); // modify them in true in one line
  2. Use ‘Arrays.reverse(…)’ or ‘Collections.reverse(…)’ to reverse.
